code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./WorkExperience.css";import ExperienceCard from"../../components/experienceCard/ExperienceCard";import{workExperiences}from"../../portfolio";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function WorkExperience(){const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);if(workExperiences.viewExperiences){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"experience",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"20px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"experience-container",id:"workExperience",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"experience-heading",children:"Experiences"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"experience-cards-div",children:workExperiences.experience.map(card=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperienceCard,{isDark:isDark,cardInfo:{company:card.company,desc:card.desc,date:card.date,companylogo:card.companylogo,role:card.role,descBullets:card.descBullets}});})})]})})})});}return null;}
